skill.name: Rise from the Valley of Flames
skill.description:
At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Salamangreat Heatleo" to your Extra Deck.

The following effect can be used if your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Select 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control, and add 1 monster with the same name to your Extra Deck. Then, play "Salamangreat Sanctuary" to your field from outside of your Deck. 

This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Soulburner
linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Soulburner. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm him as efficiently as possible.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate.
You will see Soulburner's unlock missions upon reaching Stage 9 or above in Duel World (DM)
Unlocking Soulburner will also unlock Duel World (VRAINS)
Normal or Special Summon a Fire monster 5 time(s).

skill.name: Monster Move
skill.description:
Select 1 monster you control, and move it to another of your Main Monster Zones. 

If you select a monster in the Extra Monster Zone, move it to your Main Monster Zone in the same column. 

This Skill can be used once per turn.

skill.name: The Tie that Binds
skill.description: Until the end of your turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters on your field times 100. This Skill can only be used once per turn.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Yugi Muto appears at the gate at Stage 13 (DM)
Yugi Muto level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
is a staple card needed for most farming decks
Achieve 1 No Damage win(s) in Duels against
Achieve 1 win(s) with 1,000 or less LP left in Duels against
Use level 7 or higher Monster Cards 2 time(s) in one Duel using
Achieve 1 win(s) with 1,000 or less LP left in Duels against

skill.name: Rise from the Valley of Flames
Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Ishizu Ishtar efficiently! Her decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Ishizu Ishtar level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
Summon LIGHT Monster(s) 200 time(s) in total.
Win 1 Duel (s) against Ishizu Ishtar at Level 30 in Duel World.
Win a Duel against Ishizu Ishatar with at least 6,000 LP remaining.

skill.name: The Tie that Binds
skill.description: Until the end of your turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters on your field times 100. This Skill can only be used once per turn.
